name: The Pew
description:
A Ludum Dare 32 entry by @ret44/@PiotrekPete/stankol

You're kid who's playing war with other kids during summer camp. To shoot you have shout PEW to your microphone. IMPORTANT : Before you can shoot, you have to calibrate your microphone. To do so - hold Q during game, say "Pew" to the microphone, then release Q. To shoot you have to shout "pew" slightly louder then during the calibration.

Controls:

WSAD - Moving around

Space - Next screen/Restart game (after game over)

Q - Microphone calibration

Escape - exit
